def is_lucky(number):
    """
    Returns True if the number is lucky, False otherwise
    """
    number = str(number)
    length = len(number)
    half = length // 2
    first_half = number[:half]
    second_half = number[half:]
    return sum([int(digit) for digit in first_half]) == sum([int(digit) for digit in second_half])

print("Yes" if is_lucky(input()) else "No")
